trophies.trophyDetail: Congratulations! You have done it!
Hit the speed of 100 km/h. This trophy showcases your skill at controlling your bike at high speeds and your willingness to take risks to achieve your goal.
Play 1 race on the map Imminent Death. This trophy acknowledges your bravery in facing the toughest and most dangerous racing conditions and your ability to stay focused and alert.
Play 1 race on the map Thunder Snow. This trophy celebrates your resilience and adaptability in dealing with extreme weather conditions and your ability to make the most of available resources.
Play 1 race on the map Devil's Bridge. This trophy recognizes your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills in overcoming complex obstacles and tricky terrain.
Play 1 race on the map City. This trophy highlights your agility and precision in navigating through crowded and dynamic urban environments on your bike.
Play 1 race in quick race mode. This trophy celebrates your first step into the world of competitive bike racing and your eagerness to learn and improve.
Play 1 race in time racing mode. This trophy acknowledges your interest in mastering the art of time management in bike racing and your desire to beat the clock.
Play 1 race in free ride mode. This trophy recognizes your curiosity and sense of adventure in exploring new terrains and routes on your bike.
Collect 10000 coins. This trophy demonstrates your skill at earning and managing in-game currency, which can be used to upgrade your bike and unlock new features.
Hit the speed of 200 km/h. This trophy showcases your determination to push your bike to the limit and your willingness to take on greater challenges.
Upgrade your Nitro skill. This trophy represents your ability to strategically use Nitro to gain an advantage in races.
Upgrade your Engine skill. This trophy highlights your technical knowledge and expertise in optimizing your bike's engine performance for better speed and acceleration.
Upgrade your Exhaust skill. This trophy acknowledges your understanding of how to enhance your bike's exhaust system for better performance and sound.
Upgrade your Tire skill. This trophy demonstrates your ability to choose and use the right tires to maximize your bike's handling and grip on different surfaces.
Buy a bike with acceleration higher than 200. This trophy showcases your ability to recognize and prioritize different aspects of bike performance and your dedication to improving your racing skills.
Buy a bike with power higher than 200. This trophy recognizes your quest for power and speed and your willingness to invest in the best equipment available.

Buy a bike with torque higher than 200. This trophy acknowledges your appreciation of the importance of torque in bike racing and your ability to optimize your bike's torque for better acceleration and handling.
Collect 100000 coins. This trophy demonstrates your resourcefulness and patience in building up your wealth and your ability to invest wisely in your racing career.
Buy a bike with acceleration higher than 300. This trophy showcases your relentless pursuit of speed and your willingness to invest in the latest and most advanced technology.
Buy a bike with power higher than 300. This trophy recognizes your desire for dominance and your ability to master the most powerful machines available.
Buy a bike with torque higher than 300. This trophy acknowledges your expertise in optimizing your bike's torque to overcome even the toughest racing challenges.
Collect 200000 coins. This trophy showcases your ability to maximize your earning potential and invest in the best equipment and upgrades for your bike.

Buy all the bikes. This trophy demonstrates your dedication to exploring and mastering every aspect of the game and your ability to unlock and utilize all the available resources to achieve your goals.
